red_lumina.name: Lumina of Strength
red_lumina.effect: Increases physical attack power and critical damage.

yellow_lumina.name: Lumina of Precision
yellow_lumina.effect: Improves critical hit chance and accuracy.

purple_lumina.name: Lumina of Harmony
purple_lumina.effect: Provides balanced bonuses to all combat attributes.

orange_lumina.name: Lumina of Fury
orange_lumina.effect: Greatly increases attack power. Additional bonuses when health is low.

cyan_lumina.name: Lumina of Clarity
cyan_lumina.effect: Enhances precision and provides immunity to mental debuffs.

pink_lumina.name: Lumina of Compassion
pink_lumina.effect: Increases healing effectiveness and provides support ability bonuses.
pink_lumina.location: Help NPCs and complete compassion quests

white_lumina.name: Lumina of Purity
white_lumina.effect: Moderate bonus to all stats. High resistance to debuffs and elemental damage.

black_lumina.name: Lumina of Shadow
black_lumina.effect: High offensive bonuses with shadow-based special effects.
black_lumina.location: Defeat shadow creatures and explore dark areas

gold_lumina.name: Lumina of Mastery
gold_lumina.effect: Significant bonuses to all primary stats. Enhances character-specific abilities.

silver_lumina.name: Lumina of Reflection
silver_lumina.effect: Reflects portion of received damage back to attackers. Chance to counter attack.

rainbow_lumina.name: Lumina of Infinity
rainbow_lumina.effect: Massive bonuses to all stats. Unlocks unique combination effects with any Pictos.
rainbow_lumina.location: Complete the ultimate trial in final expedition

void_lumina.name: Lumina of the Void
void_lumina.effect: Attacks ignore enemy defenses. Chance for chaotic effects that alter battle conditions.
void_lumina.location: Defeat the Void Entity (New Game+ Boss)

crystal_lumina.name: Lumina of Perfection
crystal_lumina.effect: High chance for perfect hits that deal maximum damage. Critical hits restore AP.
crystal_lumina.location: Achieve perfect scores in all combat trials

monochrome_bonus.name: Monochrome Mastery
monochrome_bonus.description: Using only one color of Lumina grants 25% bonus to that color's primary stat
monochrome_bonus.requirement: All equipped Luminas must be the same color

rainbow_set.name: Spectrum Synergy
rainbow_set.description: Using 3+ different colored Luminas grants 15% bonus to all stats
rainbow_set.requirement: Equip 3 or more different colored Luminas

complementary_pairs.name: Complementary Colors
complementary_pairs.description: Specific color combinations provide unique bonuses

combinations.red_blue: Balanced Fighter: +20% to attack and defense
combinations.yellow_purple: Tactical Genius: +25% critical rate and accuracy
combinations.green_orange: Berserker Speedster: +30% speed when health below 50%
combinations.cyan_pink: Support Master: +40% to all support abilities
combinations.white_black: Yin Yang: Switch between two different stat profiles
combinations.gold_silver: Precious Metals: All abilities cost -1 AP (minimum 1)

special_luminas.time_lumina: Unlocked after completing Time Trial mode

lumina_resonance.description: Using the same Lumina type repeatedly increases its effectiveness
